edu.umn.ncs
[Groovy] Class ContactRole

java.lang.Object
  ContactRole
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
class ContactRole

This class assigns a particular contact role between two people. Example contact types that can be created are: Emergency, Tracing, Next of Kin, Power of Attorney... While this is the class that holds the actual contact relationship between two people, the class that defines the type of relationship is the edu.umn.ncs.ContactRoleType class.

Property Summary
java.lang.String appCreated

This field should be assigned the name of the application that is creating an instance of this class.
static java.lang.Object belongsTo

The static belongsTo exposes the 'person' attribute for this class that the ContactRole belongs to.

static java.lang.Object constraints

This contains any constraints for this domain class.

java.util.Date dateCreated

This field is automatically assigned the date that this particular ContactRole instance was created
java.util.Date infoDate

This should containt the date that we gained knowledge of this contact.

Source infoSource

If the source of this information is known, a linked instance of a edu.umn.ncs.Source domain class can be assigned telling us where we learned about this particular contact.
java.util.Date lastUpdated

This field should be propogated with the current date and time "new Date()" that an instance of this class is updated.

static java.lang.Object mapping

This mapping defines the default sort order of this domain class to be by relatedPerson
Person relatedPerson

This is the person acting as the role for the person to whom this ContactRole belongs to.

ContactRoleType role

This defines the type of contact role that this instance represents.

java.lang.String userCreated

This field should be assigned the username of the authenticated user that is creating an instance of this class.
java.lang.String userUpdated

This field should be propogated with the username of the authenticated user when an instance of this class is updated.

Property Detail

appCreated

java.lang.String appCreated
This field should be assigned the name of the application that is creating an instance of this class.

belongsTo

static java.lang.Object belongsTo
The static belongsTo exposes the 'person' attribute for this class that the ContactRole belongs to. This is a required attribute, as it is part of the 'belongsTo' map

constraints

static java.lang.Object constraints
This contains any constraints for this domain class. Non-default constraints for this class are
  • lastUpdated is nullable (optional)
  • userUpaded is nullable (optional)
  • infoDate is nullable (optional)
  • infoSource is nullable (optional)

dateCreated

java.util.Date dateCreated
This field is automatically assigned the date that this particular ContactRole instance was created

infoDate

java.util.Date infoDate
This should containt the date that we gained knowledge of this contact. Typically this is the day of, or a few days prior to the date it was entered.

infoSource

Source infoSource
If the source of this information is known, a linked instance of a edu.umn.ncs.Source domain class can be assigned telling us where we learned about this particular contact.

lastUpdated

java.util.Date lastUpdated
This field should be propogated with the current date and time "new Date()" that an instance of this class is updated. Grails will automatically take care of this per section 5.5.1 of the Grails 1.3.7 documentation.

mapping

static java.lang.Object mapping
This mapping defines the default sort order of this domain class to be by relatedPerson

relatedPerson

Person relatedPerson
This is the person acting as the role for the person to whom this ContactRole belongs to. Written as an english sentence, it would read: 
${relatedPerson} is the ${role} contact for ${person}.

role

ContactRoleType role
This defines the type of contact role that this instance represents. The type is restricted to those provided by the ContactRoleType class.

userCreated

java.lang.String userCreated
This field should be assigned the username of the authenticated user that is creating an instance of this class.

userUpdated

java.lang.String userUpdated
This field should be propogated with the username of the authenticated user when an instance of this class is updated.

 
Constructor Detail

ContactRole

ContactRole()

 
Method Detail

toString

java.lang.String toString()
This is the default string converter for this domain class. This toString method returns the following: 
"${relatedPerson} is a(n) ${role} contact for ${person}"
